hero.title: Who are we?
hero.description: We are a full-service web development studio specializing in crafting websites and web applications. Our team has extensive experience in both front-end and back-end development, as well as in web design. We help bring ideas to life online.
hero.experience_description: Our team has been building web solutions for over 3 years, creating websites and web applications for a diverse range of clients.
hero.projects_description: We've completed numerous projects, from simple showcase sites to large-scale applications and e-commerce platforms.
hero.clients_description: We're proud to empower our clients to achieve their digital goals and support their future success.
hero.subtitle: A team of enthusiasts at the service of your digital transformation.

about.title: About
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer. I started when I was 8 years old, writing my first lines of code in Java, creating Minecraft mods. I then moved on to web development and now work with the latest technologies, such as Svelte, Bun, and TypeScript. In the future, I want to create applications for everyone that simplify life.

education.title: Training
education.description: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Mathematics, and I am currently studying Multimedia and Internet at the University of Mulhouse, where I am learning web development, communication, 3D, video, and audio. I am in my second year and am currently specializing in web development.

about.title: Who are we?
about.description: I'm a full-stack web developer passionate about building websites and web applications. I have extensive experience in front-end and back-end development, as well as web design. My goal is to help you bring your ideas to life online.
about.experience_description: I have been a developer by passion for over 10 years, and since 2022, I have been creating websites and web applications for my clients.
about.projects_description: I have completed numerous projects, ranging from simple showcase sites to large-scale applications and online stores.
about.clients_description: I am proud to have helped my clients achieve their goals, and I hope to support them as best I can in their future projects.

uha.description: I am a computer science student at the University of Haute-Alsace, where I am acquiring skills in web and mobile development, as well as project management in BUT MMI.

theodore_deck.description: I obtained my baccalaureate with honors in math and computer science at Lycée Théodore Deck in Guebwiller.
